1404630.name: All Hit All Her
1404630.description:
This game invites you to an action-packed adventure.
With interesting episode designs, a different adventure will be waiting for you in each episode.
Now, are you ready to hit all enemies?

In the game you are in charge of a secret military base, and you are a scientist working in a laboratory.
Many scientific researches are carried out in this facility.
Communicating with aliens is one of them.
Efforts to communicate with aliens are successful, and aliens come to earth and take over this military base and kill everyone.
You are the only survivors and you take this as a mission to yourself to send these aliens where they belong.
Different enemies, different weapons and different locations will be waiting for you in each level.

Note: You need to get the key to unlock the locked doors, after you get the key, go to the locked door and press enter.
If the door does not open, use the key on a different door.
